1.0.1.name: wordpress/auto-post-posts
1.0.1.description:
APP (Auto Post Posts) enables you to automatically post your drafted wordpress posts. It works this way; Whenever a user enters your website, the plugins check to see if it should publish a new drafted post. If a number of seconds have passed since the plugin last published a post, it will publish a new one. Once it publish a post, it will set a flag in the database that it published a post NOW, and the timer starts over.

Simply download, activate and go to Settings -> Auto Post Posts and fix the settings!

Suggestions or questions? Email me at; henric-johansson [at] hotmail [dot] com or use the contact form at: http://www.keklabprogramming.com
